thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lenny was right!
thread.title_full: Lenny was right! - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Darthgill
title: Lenny was right!
text:
Absolutely fabulous hotel.
The staff were super helpful, we got extra pillows and tea and coffee, quickly and with a smile.
The beds were awesomely comfy and the room lovely and warm. Being right next to the DLR we thought it might be noisy but even with the trains passing 30ft away you couldn't hear a thing.
The en suite was well appointed and clean and the shower hot and strong.
Great location to get to Tower Bridge, the Shard etc
